subject: Baseball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A construction worker who ran a red light and killed the rookie Los Angeles Angels pitcher Nick Adenhart and two other people was sentenced to 51 years to life in prison.
snippet: A construction worker who ran a red light and killed the rookie Los Angeles Angels pitcher Nick Adenhart and two other people was sentenced to 51 years to life in prison.
